snippet: HCA Holdings, the largest hospital operator in the United States, said that the health care overhaul should add to its results in 2014.
abstract: HCA Holdings, largest hospital operator in United States, says that its net income grew 35 percent in the fourth quarter, and that the health care overhaul should add to its results in 2014.
lead_paragraph: HCA Holdings, the largest hospital operator in the United States, said that the health care overhaul should add to its results in 2014.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
